title: He’s Usually Prettier Than the Girls. I Like “Yorinuki Aki-San” More Than the Cross-Dresser Aki-San! - Novel Updates
author: Aki Hatake   秋葉竹
description:
“I like Yorinuki Aki-san more than Aki-san, the cross-dressing boy.”

He said something random like that.

I was beaten to a pulp by her joking attitude.

I got up from the floor where I had crawled, and while flicking off the dirt on my clothes with my hands, I said something.

Okay, then I’ll let you off with this for today.

That’s Kansai dialect, isn’t it?>
